Posted By: lorendorky (4/26/2012 8:54:53 PM)

posts.post_content:
ADDED: how the freak did pointing out an enchcantment that gives +2/+2 , trample and lifelink make the top rated comment overall?
  
   
That is just.. URG. the rating system should not be open to people with bad judgment.
  
   
---
  
   
Let's list the ways to get rid of her...
  
   
1) Block her or force her to block something with power 5+ (or deathtouch)
  
2) Day of Judgment (standard) Wrath of God (modern), basically feild clear.
  
3) Legends rule. So, Phantasmal image and phyrexian metamorph, or someone playing with her themselves.
  
   
5 mana for a 5/5 flying is insane as is. This card has one of the easiest times ever. Liliana Viel will cry at it, geths verdict and tribute to hunger no longer matter.
  
   
I ascociate this card on the same level as Thrun, the Last Troll. Putting her down guarantee’s significant field dominance for a good portion of the game. 5 mana is not hard to get, and in the colors of low mana winee spam? She is going to be a standard staple, decks built in WG just to use... [(see all)](javascript:void(0);)

posts.post_content: This card is by far the best Legendary, if not THE best angel in Avacyn Restored simply due to the fact that she is the cheapest to cast out of all her sisters and is harder to remove than them, save Avacyn. In her colors, she can easily be cast turn four, and most players won't have an answer to a 5/5 hexproof flier that early in the game. 4.5/5 at least.

posts.post_content:
@StoicChampion  
  
You have nothing in that list that gives you shroud. Therefore, I choose [Sudden Spoiling](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Sudden Spoiling) followed by [Anarchy](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Anarchy). Then when you cast [Ghostway](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Ghostway), I play [Evacuation](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Evacuation).  
  
Alternatively, here are some ways to deal with your scenario without ever targeting anything:  
  
[Martyr's Cry](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Martyr's Cry)  
[Bane of the Living](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Bane of the Living)  
[Arena of the Ancients](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Arena of the Ancients) + [Angel's Trumpet](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Angel's Trumpet)  
[Everlasting Torment](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Everlasting Torment) + [Slagstorm](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Slagstorm), etc.  
[Ichor Rats](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Ichor Rats) + [Steady Progress](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Steady Progress)  
  
Etc.
posts.html:
@StoicChampion

You have nothing in that list that gives you shroud. Therefore, I choose Sudden Spoiling followed by Anarchy. Then when you cast Ghostway, I play Evacuation.

Alternatively, here are some ways to deal with your scenario without ever targeting anything:

Martyr's Cry

Arena of the Ancients + Angel's Trumpet
Everlasting Torment + Slagstorm, etc.
Ichor Rats + Steady Progress

Etc.
